Christian Fuentes

Chino Hills, CA premier luxury real estate professional with over two decades of excellence

A Legacy of Excellence

Christian Fuentes, co-owner of RE/MAX Top Producers in Diamond Bar California and Realtor in Chino Hills CA, is a 20+ year real estate industry veteran. Christian has built a solid foundation of clientele through his hard work and dedication to customer service.

Christian not only works with standard residential buyers and sellers but also takes pride in working with investors. Christian has a long record of successfully guiding local investors with residential acquisitions, lease obligations, and asset disposition. In the last 8 years Christian has rehabbed and flipped over 300 properties.

Personal & Professional Success

Christian's hard work and determination over the past 21 years has paid off in a big way, placing him in the RE/MAX Diamond Club 2012 through 2017! Christian's team averages 140 sales per year (for the last 5 years). As the team leader of the award-winning dream team, Christian, Realtor in Chino Hills CA., has been ranked in the Top 10 among RE/MAX teams in California/Hawaii from 2012 to 2019.

Not only successful in business but also in his personal life. Christian shares his life with his best friend Jeannette Fuentes and they have two beautiful children together. Christian and Jeannette have been married for 12 years and both work together to run their office. They own 3 RE/MAX Top Producers offices located in Diamond Bar, Brea, and Chino / Chino Hills.
